title: Reincarnated as the Only Son (18 Years Old) Of the Arrogant and Wicked Marquis Family - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Dense Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Maids   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnation   Younger Love Interests
author: 夏乃実   濃縮還元ぶどうちゃん
description:
The beautiful daughter of a count 'Princess Benihana', who accepts everyone with open arms, someone who has received an immeasurable amount of marriage proposals.
The 'Bookworm,' a young brilliant and talented yet unsociable lady who frequents the library.
The 'Beautiful Diva', a young lady who refuses to get involved with others, a lady who none does not know of.


These daughters of a famous family are bound to get involved with each other.>
